actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code so as to entitle veterans of World War I and their widows and children to pension on the same basis as veterans of the Spanish-American War and their widows and children, respectively and to increase pension rates.

summary.text: Entitles veterans of World War I and their widows and children to pension on the same basis as veterans of the Spanish American War and their widows and children, respectively. Increases the pension rates applicable to such veterans.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code so as to entitle veterans of World War I and their widows and children to pension on the same basis as veterans of the Spanish-American War and their widows and children, respectively and to increase pension rates.
